description: Welcome Ariel to her debut Hogtied appearance. Her dark hair and dark eyes attached to a killer flexible body is a formula for hotness. We met Ariel at Fetishcon this year and this girl made the entire trip worth it. Ariel is as tough as she is beautiful as she took the cane and some hard assorted foot torture. Throw in a Category 5 suspension and I personally cannot wait to get her back.
title: Ariel X
